articles.title: Graying Hair a Result of “Stuck” Stem Cells - Technology Networks
articles.description: A new study led by NYU Langone researchers finds that the stem cells required for hair pigmentation can become “stuck”, preventing their differentiation and the maintenance of hair color. The research is published in Nature.
